issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description:
1. Launch KS.
2. Go to BaseUI --> tabgroup.

h5.Actual Result:
1. Tapping on tabgroup does not do anything.

h5.Expected Result:
1. The tabgroup test should launch & work expected
fields.summary: BlackBerry: KitchenSink: TabGroup test in BaseUI tab does not work
fields.environment:
Environment:
Appc Studio : 3.2.3.201403250634
Ti SDK : 3.2.2.GA
Mac OSX : 10.8.5
Alloy : 1.3.1	
CLI - 3.2.3-dev
BB Z10 - 10.2.1.2.2156
Kitchensink from studio (3.2.2)

comments.body:
Verified the FIXED with:
Appc-Studio:3.3.0.201405121247
sdk:3.3.0.v20140514163013
acs:1.0.14
alloy:1.4.0-alpha
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.3.0-dev
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1
xcode:5.1.1
Device:Blackberry Z10(10.0.10.261)

TabGroup test in BaseUI tab working as expected.
Hence Closing the issue.
